page.title: 08DENBIGH WILDLIFE SURVEY(2)
page.content: { {4.}Do you care about the threat to wildlife? YES NO { 82% 18% {5.}What do you think should be done? Answers broadly based on: LEGISLATION EDUCATION DON'T KNOW {46% 11% 43% {6.}Can you name a threatened animal in this country? NOT ACCEPTABLE ACCEPTABLE REPLIES /Don't know {61% 39% {The conclusions from the survey were: {a.Most people take an interest in {either animals or plants {b.Most people are aware of the threat {to wildlife. {c.Most people care about the threat to {wildlife. {d.A substantial number of people were {unable to offer specific solutions to {the threat to wildlife.
